traits.appearance: has an unusual eye color (or two different colors)
traits.abilities: is lithe, agile, and graceful, but is feeble and scrawny

personality.mannerism: Brings up anecdotal backstory as examples to conversation Eg. 'Hey that reminds me of the time I-'
personality.interaction: Thinks of the Party as friends

voice.vocals: Speaks Normally, at a Normal pitch.
